org.haldean.chopper.server
Class TiltComponent

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              org.haldean.chopper.server.TiltComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, Serializable
Deprecated. Use OrientationComponent instead 

public class TiltComponent
extends javax.swing.JComponent

A component to show the orientation in three axes of the chopper. This is a series of 2D projections unlike OrientationComponent, which uses a single 3D rendering.

Author:
William Brown
See Also:
Serialized Form
